name: Simple Lobster Scampi
author: cdlab
summary: An easy way to use pre-cooked lobster. Simple, fast, and delicious! You can substitute shrimp or scallops for the lobster. This recipe is really suited to your tastes, that is why so many of the measurements are approximate. I have made this often and never measure anything, and it comes out delicious every time! Serve over your choice of cooked pasta. T
ingredients: 1 ½ tablespoons minced garlic, or to taste
1 ½ pounds cooked lobster meat, cut into bite-size pieces
½ cup white wine, or to taste
¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
½ cup bread crumbs, or more as needed
directions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat
Add garlic; cook and stir until aromatic, about 5 minutes
Add lobster and cook until heated through, 5 to 10 minutes
Add wine and lemon juice; bring to a boil
Add Parmesan cheese; cook until melted, about 2 minutes
Add bread crumbs slowly, 2 tablespoons at a time, bringing to a boil after each addition
